meanings.definition: A plate or plaque inscribed with a person's name, typically attached to a door or wall.
meanings.sent1: The nameplate on the door showed the occupant's name.
meanings.sent2: She proudly hung the nameplate on her office wall.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat tried to steal the nameplate from the door.
meanings.sent4: The nameplate on the wall seemed to whisper stories of the past.
meanings.sent5: The shiny nameplate gleamed in the sunlight, catching everyone's eye.

meanings.definition: A strip of metal, plastic, or other material bearing a person's name and job title, attached to a desk or cubicle.
meanings.sent1: The nameplate on his desk displayed his job title clearly.
meanings.sent2: She carefully placed the nameplate on her cubicle wall.
meanings.sent3: The nameplate on the desk seemed to be chatting with the stapler.
meanings.sent4: His nameplate shone brightly, reflecting his dedication to work.
meanings.sent5: The nameplate on the cubicle stood out among the sea of desks, announcing her presence.

meanings.definition: A small sign or label identifying a product or piece of equipment.
meanings.sent1: The nameplate on the machine indicated its model number.
meanings.sent2: He checked the nameplate on the product to verify its authenticity.
meanings.sent3: The nameplate on the tool decided to take a day off.
meanings.sent4: The nameplate on the equipment whispered secrets of its origin.
meanings.sent5: The bright red nameplate on the product made it easy to spot in the store.
